title: X Algo Soccer Formation: Rules & Scoring System

introduction.lead: Compete to optimize X engagement using soccer formation tactics. Teams score points by executing signal-driven plays in real-world campaigns.
introduction.body: This competition challenges participants to apply 5-3-2, 4-4-2, and 3-5-2 formations to grow X accounts, with scoring based on algorithmic performance metrics and tactical execution.

sections.heading: Competition Overview
sections.content:
**Format**: 8-week tournament (Jan-Feb 2026)

**Teams**: 3-5 players per team, max 20 teams

**Objective**: Achieve highest engagement score using formation tactics

**Prize Pool**: $10,000 USD + GEOCoLab Pro subscriptions

**Registration**: Open to GEOCoLab Community tier (free) and above

items.title: Week 1-2: Formation Selection
items.details: Choose 5-3-2, 4-4-2, or 3-5-2. Submit tactical plan (target audience, content themes, signal priorities). Panel reviews for feasibility. Max 200 points for tactical clarity.

items.title: Week 3-5: Campaign Execution
items.details: Execute 15-20 posts per team using chosen formation. Track metrics daily. Submit weekly reports (analytics screenshots, case studies). Earn points based on scoring table.

items.title: Week 6-7: Formation Swap Challenge
items.details: Adapt to new formation (random assignment). Demonstrate tactical flexibility. Bonus 300 points for <10% performance drop during swap.

items.title: Week 8: Finals
items.details: Top 5 teams present case studies to panel. Live Q&A with community. Innovation bonus awarded. Cumulative scores determine winner.

items.title: Algorithmic Performance (60%)
items.details: Points from scoring table (replies, bookmarks, dwell time, etc.). Verified via analytics screenshots.

items.title: Tactical Execution (25%)
items.details: How well team follows chosen formation. Panel reviews content strategy alignment.

items.title: Innovation (15%)
items.details: Novel tactics, experimental plays, documented insights. Bonus for discoveries shared with community.

sections.heading: Rules & Constraints
items: **No Automation**: Bots, auto-replies, or purchased engagement = disqualification
**Authentic Accounts**: Minimum 6 months old, 500+ followers at start
**Spam Penalties**: Single penalty = -100 points + team warning. Two penalties = disqualification.
**Content Guidelines**: Must comply with X TOS. No hate speech, harassment, or misinformation.
**Analytics Verification**: Weekly screenshot submissions. Random audits by panel.

rows: GEOCoLab Premium (1 year) + Featured case study
GEOCoLab Pro (1 year) + Panel guest spot
GEOCoLab Community recognition + Tactical playbook access

sections.heading: Registration & Eligibility
sections.content:
**How to Register**:
1. Form teams of 3-5 players (solo entries accepted, auto-matched)
2. Submit team name + X handles via GEOCoLab portal
3. Select primary account for tracking (team captain)
4. Pay $50 registration fee (waived for Pro/Premium subscribers)
5. Attend mandatory kickoff session (Jan 20, 2026)

**Eligibility**:
- 18+ years old
- Active X account (500+ followers, 6+ months old)
- GEOCoLab Community tier or above
- Agree to share analytics for transparency

faq.question: Can I compete solo?
faq.answer: Yes. Solo entries are auto-matched into teams of 3-5 based on niche/follower count. You can also recruit teammates via GEOCoLab Discord.

faq.question: What if my account gets penalized outside the competition?
faq.answer: Pre-existing penalties won't disqualify you, but competition-related penalties result in -100 points. Two penalties during the 8 weeks = disqualification.

faq.question: How are analytics verified?
faq.answer: Teams submit weekly screenshots from X Analytics dashboard. Panel conducts random audits (10% of teams/week). Falsified data = immediate disqualification + ban from future events.
